title: HierarchicalAgentLoader Import and Health Check Fixes
description: Fixed two critical issues in the HierarchicalAgentLoader system

fixes_applied.fix: Added overall_health=HealthLevel.UNKNOWN parameter to SystemHealthReport initialization
fixes_applied.root_cause: SystemHealthReport constructor required overall_health parameter but was instantiated without it

fixes_applied.fix: Changed API format from content field to messages array format
fixes_applied.root_cause: mem0AI API now requires messages array instead of direct content field
